system.description: When you mislead, distract, or trick someone, roll + Superior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You’re hopelessly embroiled in it and under pressure; mark a condition.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
They are fooled, at least for a moment.

Choose two.

  • you get an opportunity
  • you expose a weakness or flaw
  • you confuse them for some time
  • you avoid further entanglement

success.label: Success!
success.value:
They are fooled, at least for a moment.

Choose three.

  • you get an opportunity
  • you expose a weakness or flaw
  • you confuse them for some time
  • you avoid further entanglement

system.choices:
• You get an opportunity
  • You expose a weakness or flaw
  • You confuse them for some time
  • You avoid further entanglement
